Name: generalized epilepsy with febrile seizures plus
Definition: An idiopathic generalized epilepsy that is characterized by febrile seizures often with accessory afebrile generalized tonic-clonic seizures with childhood onset.

Name: obsolete Dravet syndrome
Definition: An idiopathic generalized epilepsy that is characterized by febrile seizures often with accessory afebrile generalized tonic-clonic seizures with childhood onset.

Name: childhood onset epileptic encephalopathy
Definition: An idiopathic generalized epilepsy characterized by onset of multiple seizure types in the first few years of life and associated with poor prognosis. Affected individuals have cognitive regression and intellectual disability.

Name: idiopathic generalized epilepsy 10
Definition: An idiopathic generalized epilepsy that has_material_basis_in variation in the GABRD on chromosome 1p36.33.

Name: idiopathic generalized epilepsy 11
Definition: An idiopathic generalized epilepsy that has_material_basis_in heterozygous mutation in the CLCN2 on chromosome 3q27.1.

Name: idiopathic generalized epilepsy 12
Definition: An idiopathic generalized epilepsy that has_material_basis_in heterozygous mutation in the SLC2A1 on chromosome 1p34.2.

Name: idiopathic generalized epilepsy 13
Definition: An idiopathic generalized epilepsy that has_material_basis_in heterozygous mutation in the GABRA1 on chromosome 5q34.

Name: idiopathic generalized epilepsy 14
Definition: An idiopathic generalized epilepsy that has_material_basis_in heterozygous mutation in the SLC12A5 on chromosome 20q13.12.

Name: idiopathic generalized epilepsy 15
Definition: An idiopathic generalized epilepsy that has_material_basis_in heterozygous mutation in the RORB on chromosome 9q21.13.
